Ticks

(NSSet *) - filteredMajorTickLocations:
 Removes any major ticks falling inside the label exclusion ranges from the set of tick locations.
(NSSet *) - filteredMinorTickLocations:

Properties

Axis

CPLineStyle * axisLineStyle
 The line style for the axis line. If nil, the line is not drawn.
CPCoordinate coordinate
 The axis coordinate.
NSDecimal labelingOrigin
 The origin used for axis labels. The default value is 0. It is only used when the axis labeling policy is CPAxisLabelingPolicyFixedInterval. The origin is a reference point used to being labeling. Labels are added at the origin, as well as at fixed intervals above and below the origin.
CPSign tickDirection
 The tick direction. The direction is given as the sign that ticks extend along the axis (eg positive, or negative).
CPPlotRange * visibleRange
 The plot range over which the axis and ticks are visible. Use this to restrict an axis to less than the full plot area width. Set to nil for no restriction.
Title

CPTextStyle * titleTextStyle
 The text style used to draw the axis title text.
CPAxisTitle * axisTitle
 The axis title. If nil, no title is drawn.
CGFloat titleOffset
 The offset distance between the axis title and the axis line.
NSString * title
 A convenience property for setting the text title of the axis.
NSDecimal titleLocation
 The position along the axis where the axis title should be centered. If NaN, the defaultTitleLocation will be used.
NSDecimal defaultTitleLocation
 The position along the axis where the axis title should be centered if titleLocation is NaN.
Major Ticks

NSDecimal majorIntervalLength
 The distance between major tick marks expressed in data coordinates.
CGFloat majorTickLength
 The length of the major tick marks.
CPLineStyle * majorTickLineStyle
 The line style for the major tick marks. If nil, the major ticks are not drawn.
NSSet * majorTickLocations
 A set of axis coordinates for all major tick marks.
NSUInteger preferredNumberOfMajorTicks
 The number of ticks that should be targeted when autogenerating positions. This property only applies when the CPAxisLabelingPolicyAutomatic policy is in use.
Minor Ticks

NSUInteger minorTicksPerInterval
 The number of minor tick marks drawn in each major tick interval.
CGFloat minorTickLength
 The length of the minor tick marks.
CPLineStyle * minorTickLineStyle
 The line style for the minor tick marks. If nil, the minor ticks are not drawn.
NSSet * minorTickLocations
 A set of axis coordinates for all minor tick marks.
Plot Space

CPPlotSpace * plotSpace
 The plot space for the axis.
Layers

BOOL separateLayers
 Use separate layers for drawing grid lines?
__weak CPPlotArea * plotArea
 The plot area that the axis belongs to.
__weak CPGridLines * minorGridLines
 The layer that draws the minor grid lines.
__weak CPGridLines * majorGridLines
 The layer that draws the major grid lines.
CPAxisSet * axisSet
 The axis set that the axis belongs to.

Labels



CPAxisLabelingPolicy labelingPolicy
 The axis labeling policy.
CGFloat labelOffset
 The offset distance between the tick marks and labels.
CGFloat labelRotation
 The rotation of the axis labels in radians. Set this property to M_PI/2.0 to have labels read up the screen, for example.
CPAlignment labelAlignment
 The alignment of the axis label with respect to the tick mark.
CPTextStyle * labelTextStyle
 The text style used to draw the label text.
NSNumberFormatter * labelFormatter
 The number formatter used to format the label text. If you need a non-numerical label, such as a date, you can use a formatter than turns the numerical plot coordinate into a string (eg 'Jan 10, 2010'). The CPTimeFormatter is useful for this purpose.
NSSet * axisLabels
 The set of axis labels.
BOOL needsRelabel
 If YES, the axis needs to be relabeled before the layer content is drawn.
NSArray * labelExclusionRanges
 An array of CPPlotRange objects. Any tick marks and labels falling inside any of the ranges in the array will not be drawn.
(void) - relabel
 Updates the axis labels.
(void) - setNeedsRelabel
 Marks the receiver as needing to update the labels before the content is next drawn.

Grid Lines



CPLineStyle * majorGridLineStyle
 The line style for the major grid lines. If nil, the major grid lines are not drawn.
CPLineStyle * minorGridLineStyle
 The line style for the minor grid lines. If nil, the minor grid lines are not drawn.
CPPlotRange * gridLinesRange
 The plot range over which the grid lines are visible. Note that this range applies to the orthogonal coordinate, not the axis coordinate itself. Set to nil for no restriction.
(void) - drawGridLinesInContext:isMajor:
 Draws grid lines into the provided graphics context.

Background Bands



NSArray * alternatingBandFills
 An array of two or more fills to be drawn between successive major tick marks.
NSMutableArray * backgroundLimitBands
 An array of CPLimitBand objects.
(void) - addBackgroundLimitBand:
 Add a background limit band.
(void) - removeBackgroundLimitBand:
 Remove a background limit band.
(void) - drawBackgroundBandsInContext:
 Draws alternating background bands into the provided graphics context.
(void) - drawBackgroundLimitsInContext:
 Draws background limit ranges into the provided graphics context.

Detailed Description

An abstract axis class.

Property Documentation

- CPAxis: [read, write, copy]

An array of two or more fills to be drawn between successive major tick marks.

When initializing the fills, provide an NSArray containing any combinination of CPFill, CPColor, CPGradient, and/or CPImage objects. Blank (transparent) bands can be created by using [NSNull null] in place of some of the CPFill objects.

- CPAxis: [read, retain]

An array of CPLimitBand objects.

The limit bands are drawn on top of the alternating band fills.

- CPAxis: [read, write, assign]

Use separate layers for drawing grid lines?

If NO, the default, the major and minor grid lines are drawn in layers shared with other axes. If YES, the grid lines are drawn in their own layers.
